thread.title: Brazil’s Sugar Cane: An Emerging Debacle
thread.title_full: Brazil’s Sugar Cane: An Emerging Debacle - WSJ

author: Julie Wernau
title: Brazil’s Sugar Cane: An Emerging Debacle
text:
Virgolino de Oliveira SA is trodding what has become a well-worn path for emerging- market companies that built up capacity to meet China’s demand for commodities only to watch it crumble.
The Brazilian sugar producer missed a bond payment in February and hasn’t been able to renegotiate the terms of its debt, according to Fitch Ratings. The company couldn’t be reached for comment, but Fitch analyst Claudio Miori said it is likely to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
